greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to write n=x+y (x,y>0) with 2x-3, 2x+3, 6y+1 and 6y+5 all prime
comment: This has been verified for n up to 10^8. It implies that there are infinitely many cousin primes and also infinitely many sexy primes.
link: Zhi-Wei Sun, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Zhi-Wei Sun, Conjectures involving primes and quadratic forms, arXiv:1211.1588.
results.author: _Zhi-Wei Sun_, Jan 03 2013
